chart_description: This chart shows the number of processed and dropped DNS requests per second for CoreDNS. It provides visibility into the status of DNS requests and can help identify any issues or bottlenecks in the DNS infrastructure.

dimension_descriptions.processed: The number of processed DNS requests per second. This includes all successfully resolved DNS requests.
dimension_descriptions.dropped: The number of dropped DNS requests per second. This includes all DNS requests that were not successfully resolved.
